title: Crush (Aeon, 1995)
description:
I'm not sure why this one hasn't had some kind of TPB or deluxe version over the years. It's a great book that seems to have become largely forgotten. It's likely that you actually have to concentrate, suspend a bit of disbelief and deal with a good deal of heavy, dark themes to really get into it. Not sure, but for me, I'm giving it a "Recommended".

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Issues 1-4 of 'Crush'

Aeon, 1995-1996, 27-36 pages

Written and Illustrated by Burpo

I don't know exactly how to describe this book and I can't find a blurb. Dystopian surrealistic futurism? It's dark, genuinely disturbing in a few places, and if you let it, it will completely envelope you... then leave you feeling slightly confused and needing a shower.
